title: One Piece Treasure Cruise Tier List
description: Navigate the ever-evolving world of One Piece Treasure Cruise with this comprehensive tier list. Discover the top-rated Legends and units, categorized into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier, to help you build powerful teams and conquer challenging content.
heading: One Piece Treasure Cruise Tier List
introText: Navigate the ever-evolving world of One Piece Treasure Cruise with this comprehensive tier list. Discover the top-rated Legends and units, categorized into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier, to help you build powerful teams and conquer challenging content. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a new adventurer, this tier list will provide valuable insights into the current meta and guide you towards making informed decisions to enhance your Treasure Cruise experience.

data.itemDescription: This dual Legend boasts incredible damage output, amazing support capabilities, and a versatile special that makes them a force to be reckoned with
A powerhouse duo that combines Roger's devastating attacks with Oden's resilience and support, making them a formidable team for any content
With his ability to negate buffs and debuffs, S-Shanks is a game-changer in many situations, providing both offensive and defensive utility
A versatile Legend who shines as both a captain and a support unit, providing damage, orb manipulation, and HP recovery
The iconic duo brings their signature teamwork to the game, delivering high damage, defense boosts, and special attack reduction
A formidable Legend with a unique mechanic that allows him to absorb buffs and debuffs, making him a powerful attacker and disrupter
A support duo that excels at manipulating orbs, reducing damage, and providing additional effects
A versatile Legend who offers damage, defense, and the ability to change enemy teams orbs
A supportive Legend who provides HP recovery, orb manipulation, and the chance to paralyze enemies
An older Legend who still packs a punch with his damage output and special that reduces enemy defense
A support unit that provides orb manipulation, defense boosts, and the chance to despair enemies
A versatile Legend who offers damage, orb manipulation, and the ability to silence enemies
